name: spotty
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: spotty
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: used to describe a person with spots on their skin
trans_examp.trans_cn: （人的皮肤）多丘疹的，多粉刺的

example.eg: I knew him when he was just a spotty youth.
example.egtrans: 在他还是个满脸粉刺的少年时，我就认识他了。

dsense.name: spotty
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （质量）参差不齐的，有好有坏的

example.eg: She has a fairly spotty work record.
example.egtrans: 她的工作业绩时好时坏。

example.eg: Sales have picked up a little but they're still spotty.
example.egtrans: 销售有所好转，但仍然起伏不定。
